name: 2Bits Of Rage
description:
Use Arrow Keys/WASD To Move

Use Space To Dash

This It's A Puzzle Rage Game In Which The Objective Is To Finish Each Level With As Few Mistakes As Possible

If You Enjoy The Game Please Consider Checking Out My Twitter I Post Updates And Other Game Dev Related Stuff There

You Are Free To Make Videos And Other Media Of The Game Without The Need To Ask Permission
